DQ7pWi6zoJcKp8m5.contentMarkdown: **Timeline Observation** Show any observations recorded when advancing exam status, displayed in italics with quotes

HHZI6xZ2DEsEra12.contentMarkdown: **Timeline Date Format** Display date and time in Brazilian format: DD/MM/YYYY às HH:MM for each completed status

VEblKfUkVKgn0WsN.contentMarkdown: **Secretary Information Label** Bold text indicating information is specifically for the secretary

advance-after-save-dialog.contentMarkdown: **Medical Opinion Save Confirmation Dialog** Dialog that appears after saving medical opinion, asking if doctor wants to advance exam to 'Medical Opinion Issued' status

advance-dialog-cancel.contentMarkdown: **Keep Current Stage Button** Outline button to keep exam in current stage after saving opinion

advance-dialog-confirm.contentMarkdown: **Advance Stage Confirmation Button** Blue button to confirm advancing exam to 'Medical Opinion Issued' status

advance-dialog-description.contentMarkdown: **Save Confirmation Description** Explains that medical opinion was saved and asks if user wants to advance exam stage

advance-dialog-title.contentMarkdown: **Save Confirmation Title** Dialog title showing 'Parecer Médico Salvo' when medical opinion is saved

advance-status-button.contentMarkdown: **Click Event** When clicked, opens dialog with optional observation field and confirmation to advance exam to next status with audit logging

audit-log-justification.contentMarkdown: **Audit Log Justification** Shows the justification text provided when actions required explanation

audit-log-user.contentMarkdown: **Audit Log User Name** Displays the actual user name who performed each action instead of just showing 'Sistema'

awaiting-opinion-card.contentMarkdown:
**Awaiting Medical Opinion Panel**

    - Stethoscope Icon
    - Title Text

- Panel Description
- Exam List (when available)
    - Patient Information
    - Exam Details (vial, lab)
    - Date Information (collection, release)
    - Status Badge (days waiting)
    - Evaluate Button
- Empty State (when no exams)
    - Empty Icon
    - Empty Message
    - Help Text

awaiting-opinion-urgent-icon.contentMarkdown: Red warning triangle icon displayed when exam has been waiting for medical opinion for 3 or more days, indicating urgent attention needed

awaiting-opinion-view-button.contentMarkdown:
**Click Event**
Navigate to exam details page for medical opinion evaluation

back-button.contentMarkdown: When clicked, navigates back to the previous page (dashboard or history)

biopsia-checkbox.contentMarkdown: **Biopsy Exam Checkbox** Checkbox for requesting anatomopathological (biopsy) examination in exam registration form with proper validation and state management

biopsia-interpretation-select.contentMarkdown: **Biopsy Interpretation Select** Medical opinion field for biopsy results with three options: Normal, Altered, or Not Performed, automatically disabled if biopsy was not requested

biopsy-performed-badge.contentMarkdown: Orange badge showing 'Biópsia Realizada' for secretaries instead of biopsy interpretation results

change-password-container.contentMarkdown:
**Change Password Page**
- Header with key icon and title
- Password change form card
    - Current password field with show/hide toggle
    - New password field with show/hide toggle
    - Confirm password field with show/hide toggle
    - Submit button
    - Password requirements list

change-password-form.contentMarkdown:
**Password Change Form**
- Current Password: Required, password input with visibility toggle
- New Password: Required, minimum 4 characters, password input with visibility toggle
- Confirm Password: Required, must match new password, password input with visibility toggle
- Submit Button: Disabled until all fields are filled

change-password-submit.contentMarkdown:
**Form Submission**
Validates current password, checks new password meets requirements, confirms passwords match, then updates user password in database and shows success message

citologia-interpretation.contentMarkdown: **Cytology Interpretation Logic** Select field for cytology results that automatically disables when cytology was not performed, preventing incorrect result entry for non-performed exams

citologia-performed-badge.contentMarkdown: Blue badge showing 'Citologia Realizada' for secretaries instead of medical interpretation results

clear-filters.contentMarkdown: When clicked, clears all applied filters and resets search to show all exams

consultation-date-info.contentMarkdown: **Consultation Date Information** Shows calculated consultation date for secretary based on return type: immediate (red), or approximate date (blue)

create-lab-button.contentMarkdown: **Click Event** Opens dialog to create new laboratory with form fields for name, contact person, phone, results link and SLA days

create-patient-button.contentMarkdown: **Click Event** Opens dialog to create new patient with form fields for full name, birth date and phone number

dashboard-container.contentMarkdown: Main dashboard with status cards showing exam counts by status, filters section, and exams list

dna-hpv-performed-badge.contentMarkdown: Purple badge showing 'DNA HPV Realizado' for secretaries instead of positive/negative results

dna-hpv-result.contentMarkdown: **DNA HPV Result Logic** Select field for HPV DNA results that automatically disables when HPV test was not requested, ensuring proper 'Not Performed' status for unrequested tests

edit-justificativa-input.contentMarkdown: **Edit Justification Input** Required textarea for entering justification when editing issued medical opinion

edit-parecer-button.contentMarkdown: **Edit Medical Opinion Button** Button to open justification dialog for editing already issued medical opinion

edit-parecer-dialog.contentMarkdown: **Edit Medical Opinion Dialog** Large modal for editing issued medical opinion with mandatory justification field and all opinion fields

edit-parecer-dialog-save.contentMarkdown: **Save Opinion Changes Button** Green button to save medical opinion changes with justification - disabled if no justification provided

edit-return-imediato.contentMarkdown: **Immediate Return Option** Select option for immediate patient return without warning emoji

email-input.contentMarkdown:
**Login Form Email Input**

  - Required

  - Placeholder: seu.email@casalmonken.com.br

exam-registration-form-card.contentMarkdown: **Exam Registration Form** Complete form for registering new cytological exams with patient selection, lab selection, collection data, and requested exams validation

filter-active-indicator.contentMarkdown: **Dashboard Status Filter Indicator** Shows 'Filtro ativo' text when a status card is selected as active filter

history-stats.contentMarkdown: Four statistics cards displaying: Total exams count, Normal results count (green), Altered results count (orange), HPV positive count (red)

lab-form.contentMarkdown: **Laboratory Form** - Laboratory Name: Required text input - Contact Person: Optional text input - Contact Phone: Optional text input - Results Link: Optional URL input - SLA Days: Optional number input

layout-header.contentMarkdown: App header with title 'Citologia Oncótica', clinic name, user info and logout button

login-button.contentMarkdown: When clicked, submits login form and authenticates user with provided credentials

login-card.contentMarkdown: White login card with shadow, maximum width 384px, responsive design

login-container.contentMarkdown: Full screen login container with gradient background from blue-50 to indigo-100, centered content layout

login-form.contentMarkdown:
**Login Form**
- Email Address: Single line input
  - Required
  - Validation: Email format
  - Placeholder: seu.email@casalmonken.com.br
- Password: Password input
  - Required
  - Validation: Match stored password
  - Placeholder: Sua senha
- Login Button
  - Disabled during loading
  - Shows spinner when processing

Clean and professional clinic logo display with appropriate sizing for login screen branding

- Font: Professional, readable typography
- Border radius style: Rounded corners for modern appearance

login-logo-container.contentMarkdown:

- Proper spacing and alignment

logout-button.contentMarkdown: When clicked, logs out current user and redirects to login screen

main-layout.contentMarkdown:
**Login State Change**
When user successfully logs in:
1. Automatically redirects to dashboard page
2. Clears any selected exam details
3. Resets navigation state to default
4. Prevents returning to previous session page

secretary-next-consultation-date.contentMarkdown: Display the calculated next consultation date in large, prominent blue text for secretary reference

secretary-reminder.contentMarkdown:

sla-monitoring-contact-button.contentMarkdown:

Open WhatsApp with pre-filled message to laboratory contact requesting information about exam delay and expected release date

status-cards.contentMarkdown: Grid of cards showing count of exams for each status: Amostra Coletada, Recolhido pelo Laboratório, etc.

status-filter.contentMarkdown: Dropdown to filter exams by status - shows all possible exam statuses

status-timeline-card.contentMarkdown: **Status Timeline Card** Shows complete chronology of exam with expandable audit log details for each step, user information, timestamps, actions and justifications

timeline-audit-log.contentMarkdown: **Timeline Audit Log** Individual audit log entry within timeline showing user name, timestamp, action description, and optional observation/justification

vX6kimxLo4fluYcv.contentMarkdown: **Timeline Responsible User** Display the name of the user responsible for each status change in the exam timeline

view-exam-button.contentMarkdown: When clicked, navigates to detailed view of the selected exam

whatsapp-section.contentMarkdown: **WhatsApp Communication Section** Appears when WhatsApp is selected as contact method, showing message preview and send button

whatsapp-send-button.contentMarkdown: **Send WhatsApp Button** Green button that opens WhatsApp with pre-filled message for patient communication
